Summary Kenny Teoh is a Senior Reliability Engineer with Avago Technologies, Penang with over 13 years of experience in the electronics & semiconductor industry. He has worked in both CPU assembly processes and Hard Disk Drive test equipment design and development engineering. 
 
Kenny earned his Bachelor of Electronics Engineering degree from Multimedia University. 
 
His current and primary role in Avago Technologies is to provide his customers with product quality/reliability services by conducting various reliability tests and ensuring they are done in accordance to JEDEC / IEC / ASTM / JEITA / Military standards or to the customer's requirements. 
 
He is in charge of reliability burn-in and testing of Avago’s Opto-Electronics (LED) Products, Wireless Semiconductor (WSD) Products and Motion Control (MCPD) Products. 
 
He also provides consultation to the QREs and R&D engineers in terms of new reliability test profiles, product operating-life setup for low and high power LEDs and reliability test profile capability studies. 
 
He has a strong interest and knowledge in reliability engineering, equipment and test related fields.
